title: Commit schema validation check in db/data submodule
description: import_osm.py changes are stashed in backend/db/data (git stash: 'schema validation pre-import check'). Adds EXPECTED_MIGRATION_ID constant and validate_schema() pre-import check. Pop stash, test, and commit in the submodule repo.

title: Add rickroll counter endpoint (backend)
description: Create api/increment_rickroll_counter endpoint. Increment rickroll_counter row in Values table (columns: name, label, num_value, string_value, id). Return num_value after incrementing.
